Today in Caithness, surf is looking solid with 6 ft @14s W swell and fresh 17 mph SE winds. Best spots include Point of Ness and Murkle Point, both working well during the tide windows. Tomorrow, conditions drop with 4 ft @8s ESE swell and strong 38 mph SE winds, making it poor across the coast. By the day after, things improve slightly with 4 ft @8s E swell and lighter winds, but still not ideal. Best: today.
